data.title: How can I add SSL seal (SSL secure image) on my front page?
data.meta_description: In most cases, you need to add custom code to your website in order to display the SSL site seal for your SSL provider. For GlobalSign, you can find the Ja
data.text:
In most cases, you need to add custom code to your website in order to display the SSL site seal for your SSL provider. For GlobalSign, you can find the JavaScript code that you should implement in your pages â€“ GlobalSign SSL Certificate Secure Site Seal.

There are different ways to insert the JavaScript code to your pages depending on your application. Use the text page editor of your application or a special plugin/extension that will allow you to add custom code to your website.
